lines.text:
[after flirting with Bonnie]
Gee whiz, after sitting here talking to you, I don't even want to think about slime people!
Dr Brough, what exactly do these creatures look like?
They're large, huge, prehistotic. Covered with scales, and covered with slime.
I say, Tom, are you driving this worn-out old heap?

[while standing right next to the slime people's wall]
Where's the wall, Daddy?

[during attempted television broadcast]
If anybody's listening, this is no joke!
Professor, you've seen these creatures. Are they from outer space, are they animals? What are they?
I believe they are a form of animal life, but not from outer space.
The ones I saw came from underground, out of the sewers.
Now look, we've got to find their trail. Footprint, slime, anything.
